programme.title: World Athletics Cross Country Championships - Tallahassee 2026
programme.desc: World Athletics Cross Country Championships – Tallahassee 2026: the 46th edition lands at Apalachee Regional Park on 10 Jan 2026, bringing the sport back to U.S. soil for the first time since 1992. Titles are decided in the senior 10km races (men & women), U20 races (8km men / 6km women) and the mixed relay (4×2km). Mud, speed, national pride—one brutal day, five world crowns

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Real Betis - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: Burnley vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Burnley won their first ever Premier League home game against Man Utd 1-0 in August 2009. programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Real Betis - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: Lorient vs Metz - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17
programme.desc: Lorient have won 56% of their Ligue 1 matches against Metz, their highest win ratio against an opponent faced at least ten times in the top-flight. programme.title: PSG vs Paris FC - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17- Mini Match
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: Casper Ruud (NOR) vs Denis Shapovalov (CAN) - Final - ATP 500 Dallas Open 2025
programme.desc: Unseeded Denis Shapovalov faces second seed Casper Ruud. Shapovalov reached the final by defeating top-seeded Taylor Fritz and defending champion Tommy Paul, securing his second and third Top 10 wins of the week. Ruud advanced after a challenging semifinal against Jaume Munar, winning in a third-set tiebreak. This final marks Shapovalov's pursuit of his third ATP title and first above the ATP 250 level, while Ruud aims for his 13th career title.

programme.title: Casper Ruud (NOR) vs Denis Shapovalov (CAN) - Final - ATP 500 Dallas Open 2025

programme.title: Alex DE MINAUR (AUS) vs Carlos ALCARAZ (ESP) - Final - ABN AMRO Open - 2025 - ATP 500
programme.desc: Rotterdam Open 2025 Final - World No. 3 Carlos Alcaraz faces World No. 8 Alex de Minaur in the ATP 500 Rotterdam Open 2025 final. Alcaraz, seeking his first Rotterdam title, leads their head-to-head 4-1, while De Minaur, known for his speed and counterpunching, aims for his second ATP 500 crown. A high-intensity battle awaits as power meets resilience on indoor hard courts.

programme.title: Alex DE MINAUR (AUS) vs Carlos ALCARAZ (ESP) - Final - ABN AMRO Open - 2025 - ATP 500
programme.desc: Rotterdam Open 2025 Final - World No. 3 Carlos Alcaraz faces World No. 8 Alex de Minaur in the ATP 500 Rotterdam Open 2025 final. Alcaraz, seeking his first Rotterdam title, leads their head-to-head 4-1, while De Minaur, known for his speed and counterpunching, aims for his second ATP 500 crown. A high-intensity battle awaits as power meets resilience on indoor hard courts.

programme.title: Sebastian BAEZ (ARG) vs Alexandre MULLER (FRA) - Final - ATP 500 - Rio Open presented by Claro - 202
programme.desc: The Rio Open presented by Claro is held on the eight clay courts, including a 6,200-seat Stadium, of the Jockey Club Brasileiro. Rafael Nadal won the inaugural edition in 2014 before David Ferrer triumphed in 2015. Dominic Thiem (2017), Diego Schwartzman (2018) and Cristian Garin (2020) have also triumphed at the ATP 500. In 2022, Carlos Alcaraz was crowned champion and became the youngest ATP 500 champion since the category was created in 2009.

programme.title: Sebastian BAEZ (ARG) vs Alexandre MULLER (FRA) - Final - ATP 500 - Rio Open presented by Claro - 202
programme.desc: The Rio Open presented by Claro is held on the eight clay courts, including a 6,200-seat Stadium, of the Jockey Club Brasileiro. Rafael Nadal won the inaugural edition in 2014 before David Ferrer triumphed in 2015. Dominic Thiem (2017), Diego Schwartzman (2018) and Cristian Garin (2020) have also triumphed at the ATP 500. In 2022, Carlos Alcaraz was crowned champion and became the youngest ATP 500 champion since the category was created in 2009.

programme.title: Jack DRAPER (GBR) vs Andrey RUBLEV - Final - Qatar ExxonMobil Open - Tennis ATP 500
programme.desc: For the first time as an ATP 500 event, the Qatar ExxonMobil Open 2025 concludes with an exciting final between Jack Draper and Andrey Rublev. Draper staged a stunning comeback, while Rublev aims for his second Doha title. The tournament featured major upsets, including Berrettini’s win over Djokovic and Lehecka’s defeat of Alcaraz. In doubles, an all-British final ensures a homegrown champion.

programme.title: Jack DRAPER (GBR) vs Andrey RUBLEV - Final - Qatar ExxonMobil Open - Tennis ATP 500
programme.desc: For the first time as an ATP 500 event, the Qatar ExxonMobil Open 2025 concludes with an exciting final between Jack Draper and Andrey Rublev. Draper staged a stunning comeback, while Rublev aims for his second Doha title. The tournament featured major upsets, including Berrettini’s win over Djokovic and Lehecka’s defeat of Alcaraz. In doubles, an all-British final ensures a homegrown champion.

programme.title: Carlos ALCARAZ (ESP) vs Holger RUNE (DEN) - Final Barcelona Open - BancSabadell 2025 - ATP 500
programme.desc: Top seed Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) faces sixth seed Holger Rune (DEN) in the final of the Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell. Alcaraz, aiming for his third consecutive Barcelona title, leads their head-to-head 2–1. Rune, seeking his first title of the season, returns to a clay-court final for the first time since 2023. A compelling clash between two of the ATP Tour's brightest young talents

programme.title: Carlos ALCARAZ (ESP) vs Holger RUNE (DEN) - Final Barcelona Open - BancSabadell 2025 - ATP 500

programme.title: Alexander ZVEREV (GER) vs Ben SHELTON (USA) - Final ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: Top seed Alexander Zverev (GER) faces second seed Ben Shelton (USA) in a compelling final at the BMW Open. Zverev, aiming for his 24th career title and third in Munich, leads their head-to-head 1–0, having won their previous encounter on hard court. Shelton, seeking his first ATP 500 title, makes history as the first American man since 2002 to reach a clay-court final at this level.

programme.title: Alexander ZVEREV (GER) vs Ben SHELTON (USA) - Final ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: Top seed Alexander Zverev (GER) faces second seed Ben Shelton (USA) in a compelling final at the BMW Open. programme.title: Flavio Cobolli (ITA) vs Andrey Rublev - Final - ATP 500 Hamburg European Open – 2025 - Final
programme.desc: Russia’s powerhouse Andrey Rublev, a former champion at Hamburg, returns to the final seeking his first title of the season. He’ll face Italy’s rising star Flavio Cobolli, who battled back in the semis from a set down to cement the biggest final of his career. Expect a thrilling clash of Rublev’s experience and firepower against Cobolli’s momentum and clay-court grit—just days before Roland Garros.

programme.title: Flavio Cobolli (ITA) vs Andrey Rublev - Final - ATP 500 Hamburg European Open – 2025 - Final
programme.desc: Russia’s powerhouse Andrey Rublev, a former champion at Hamburg, returns to the final seeking his first title of the season. programme.title: AO Originals - Ambition
programme.desc: AMBITION is the story of tennis’ fearless new breed rewriting the rules on the sport’s biggest stage - with Alcaraz, Sinner, Gauff, Swiatek and a wave of hungry young challengers reshaping the game with raw talent and audacious self-belief

programme.title: Alexander BUBLIK (KAZ) vs Daniil MEDVEDEV - Final - ATP 500 Terra Wortmann Open 2025
programme.desc: Kazakhstan’s Alexander Bublik faces Russia’s Daniil Medvedev in a high-stakes grass-court final. Bublik returns to defend his 2023 title after a strong win over Khachanov, while Medvedev reached his first final in 15 months with a dramatic three-set victory over Zverev. Medvedev leads their head-to-head 4–2 and is chasing his first title of the season.

programme.title: Alexander BUBLIK (KAZ) vs Daniil MEDVEDEV - Final - ATP 500 Terra Wortmann Open 2025
programme.desc: Kazakhstan’s Alexander Bublik faces Russia’s Daniil Medvedev in a high-stakes grass-court final. programme.title: Jannik SINNER (ITA) vs Learner TIEN (USA) - China Open, Beijing - 2025 - ATP 500 - Final
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner vs Learner Tien. Sinner reaches his third straight Beijing final—his 30th tour-level title match and ninth in a row on hard courts. Teenager Tien, 19, is into his first ATP final after Medvedev retired in the semis. First meeting between the pair. Fast hard court favors Sinner’s first-strike baseline power; Tien counters with speed and resilience. 500 ranking points and the Beijing crown at stake.

programme.title: Jannik SINNER (ITA) vs Learner TIEN (USA) - China Open, Beijing - 2025 - ATP 500 - Final
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner vs Learner Tien. Sinner reaches his third straight Beijing final—his 30th tour-level title match and ninth in a row on hard courts. programme.title: Alejandro DAVIDOVICH FOKINA (ESP) vs Joao FONSECA (BRA) - ATP 500 - Swiss Indoors Basel - 2025
programme.desc: 54th edition at St. Jakobshalle, 18–26 Oct 2025. Total prize money €2,523,045. Fast indoor hard court with low bounce rewards first-strike tennis and often produces tiebreaks. With Turin qualification pressure, expect tight day/night sessions and high-seed upsets. Record champion: Roger Federer (10 titles).

programme.title: Alejandro DAVIDOVICH FOKINA (ESP) vs Joao FONSECA (BRA) - ATP 500 - Swiss Indoors Basel - 2025
programme.desc: 54th edition at St. Jakobshalle, 18–26 Oct 2025. Total prize money €2,523,045. Fast indoor hard court with low bounce rewards first-strike tennis and often produces tiebreaks. programme.title: Final's - Arab Elite Tennis Championship - 2025
programme.desc: 5th Arab Tennis Elite Tournament – Manama, Bahrain concludes with the Singles Final as Mohammad Al Qutb (Jordan) meets Aziz Al Waqaa (Tunisia) on the hard courts of the Public Security Officers Club. A 24-player elite field from the Arab Tennis Federation circuit features ATP and ITF-ranked competitors, alongside a parallel U16 Arab Juniors event. programme.title: Holger RUNE (DEN) vs Jack DRAPER (GBR) - Final BNP Paribas Open - presentado por HSBC 2025 - TENNIS
programme.desc: Holger Rune (DEN) meets Jack Draper (GBR) in the 2025 BNP Paribas Open final, the first ATP Masters 1000 title match between two players born in the 2000s. Rune defeated Daniil Medvedev in the semis with sharp tactics, while Draper edged past Carlos Alcaraz, displaying power and resilience. Rune leads their head-to-head 1-0, having won their 2024 Cincinnati clash in straight sets.

programme.title: Casper Ruud (NOR) vs Jack Draper (GBR) - Final - Mutua Madrid Open 2025 - ATP 1000
programme.desc: In a first-ever ATP Tour meeting, clay-court specialist Casper Ruud takes on rising British star Jack Draper in the 2025 Madrid final. Ruud, a two-time Grand Slam finalist, is seeking his first Masters 1000 title. Draper, who claimed his breakthrough Masters win in Indian Wells earlier this season, aims to secure a second major trophy in 2025. A compelling battle awaits on the Caja Mágica clay.

programme.title: Felix AUGER-ALIASSIME (CAN) vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) - Final - Rolex Paris Masters - Paris - 2025

programme.title: Al Wakrah vs Al Arabi - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W12

programme.title: "AHMED ELMOHAMADYThe Three Peat" - Afcon 2025
programme.desc: "Following Egypt’s 2006 AFCON win, he established himself as a regular in the national team. Ahmed Elmohamady recounts the side’s three tournament triumphs between 2006 and 2010 and explains how his displays during that period secured a transfer to the Premier League."

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: AFCON Morocco 2025 Show
programme.desc: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations, commonly known as AFCON 2025, marks the 35th edition of this prestigious biennial tournament organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF). This edition will be hosted by Morocco for the second time, following its previous hosting in 1988. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the AFCON Morcco 2025 on beIN Sports News.
